message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to take this deal now.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice.  I'm proposing a more balanced split this time. Let's avoid letting the money depreciate any further.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is a reasonable offer, slightly better for me than your last, which takes into account the time pressure.
Alice, this needs to be resolved soon. I'm offering a split that's slightly better for me, recognizing that the clock is ticking and further delays hurt you more than me.
